"Schools: don't wait to solely solve problems in #mentalhealth but rather ensure well-being is at the forefront." Dr. Masaki
"Whatever your duty, do it as fully & as well as you can. Then go & support those who are less fortunate than you." Founder, @Starehe_Boys
Wonderful presentation from @Starehe_Boys graduate Dr. Masaki re: working on known & unknown world health challenges https://t.co/SZ0Oa62e5T
"Working in global health: we need to consider that despite having good intentions, we may do more harm than good." Dr. Masaki
The IDEALS of the @r0undsquare had built a framework for me to tell my story in a reflective way, assisting my Rhodes Scholar application.
"Opportunities to communicate with others from differing worlds goes beyond language." Dr. Charles Masaki @Starehe_Boys @r0undsquare
My @r0undsquare experience has informed my ability to consider other's perspectives and ideas in the medical field: Dr. Masaki
"My @rOundsquare international experiences informed me in seeking to understand #identity- both other and my own" Dr. Masaki #compassion
I learned from @Starehe_Boys and @r0undsquare how to ensure that we nurture #compassion: Dr. Charles Masaki
Dr. Masaki "Exposure to radio allowed me an awareness of the larger world beyond my own backyard. "
Thrilled to be hearing from Dr. Charles Masaki - graduate of @Starehe_Boys a @r0undsquare school. Wonderful to hear about the #journey

Wonderful to hear from Richard Stobol from @NYCOutwardBound while at @r0undsquare Americas regional meeting.

Great imagery: 'Search for problems and their solutions like a man searches for water when his hair is on fire.' @PeterDiamandis
'As a species we have done our best work when we were in our exploratory mode.' @PeterDiamandis 'we should explore the opening up of space.'
Great question to @PeterDiamandis re; #ethics. Must give birth to moral ethical leaders at same time as encouraging use of technologies.
The questions we ask will be the most important. The information is increasingly available. @PeterDiamandis
Love this: Call your shot: 'during my life time, I am going to solve 'x' problem.' We must nurture that in our students.' @PeterDiamandis
We must ask great questions, solve great problems + foster passions for our students. Future is exciting. @PeterDiamandis @SCS_Clementines
Opportunities are immense / growing exponentially for our students. Tools - once in hands of few- are in the hands of all. @PeterDiamandis
'An explosion of drones used as delivery services: 'everything everywhere at all times is being recorded and imaged.' @PeterDiamandis
' Ask good questions.' One of the most important consideration for us and our students. @PeterDiamandis @SCS_Clementines @SASCOTS
Rate of change: increasing at remarkable rates: computational power + slew of technology. Gives us 'power' to do what we want when we want.
Massively transformative purpose: captures your shower time. Love this! @PeterDiamandis
'We must drive people by their passion or purpose: we want to be driven to do something to make world better place' @PeterDiamandis
The best way to predict the future is to invent it :@PeterDiamandis How do we prepare our students for the world ahead?
Thrilled to be at @SASCOTS for @r0undsquare americas meeting. About to hear @PeterDiamandis #entrepreneurialism #innovation
